reviews.review: This is a powerhouse of a superhero film, the most ambitious and well-executed adaptation of a conflict leading to a legendary moment that leaves a lasting impact with those who have followed Marvel films since the first Iron Man.  The only reason I am not giving this film 5 stars is because much of what is happening and who each of these characters are will easily go over the heads of general moviegoers who have barely watched any Marvel movies.  While this film can arguably hold its own, its mostly dependent on viewers having previously seen every Marvel film to really feel the full impact of this story.  Infinity War is a cinematic experience unlike any other that will have a unique place in history.

undoubtedly the best superhero movie ever made, The sheer scope of giving that many heroes their moments in the spotlight was incredible and in Thanos, Josh Brolin gave us one of cinema's greatest villains, Brutal, Driven, Intelligent and some might say very very relatable.
A exciting (in the way of the situation LOL) and simply great film! I cried ALL the time, but I don't regret! Sooo anxious for the 'next'!!
Phenomenal work all around. Working the characters and all their quirks into this film was expertly done, without suffering issues in other areas like cinematography or story arc! Superb!

Long awaited movie, given how long I'd waited for it to come out, I thought they crammed it a bit, they could have added another half an hour to it and I probably would sat thru the extra time with more popcorn super contentedly , can't wait for endgame, see how the crew get out of this one
I was literally crying... give me some more of this please!
Best one yet!  Intense and entertaining in every way possible.
What a great movie, can't wait for Avengers End Game
Pretty amazing movie, the CGI on Thanos is amazing.  Great work juggling all of the different super heroes.
